restaurant.name: Windmill Creek Winery & Farm Kitchen
restaurant.description: Winery & farm kitchen located in Berlin, MD — seasonal menus, events, and tastings.

faqs.question: Do you take reservations?
faqs.answer: Yes — we accept reservations for dining and special events. Use our reservation form or call us.

faqs.question: Do you offer outdoor seating?
faqs.answer: Yes — we have patios and outdoor seating when weather permits.

faqs.question: Is there a tasting room?
faqs.answer: Yes — we have a winery tasting room and offer flights and bottle sales.

items.name: Kids Menu
items.description: Served with house chips, or add a side for $3.

items.name: Gluten free upon request
items.description: Sides $3: French Fries, Sweet Potato Fries, Fruit, Applesauce

items.name: Winter Salad
items.description: Roasted butternut squash, brussels sprouts, red onion, dried fruit, pumpkin seeds, and bacon over mixed greens with maple-Dijon vinaigrette.

items.name: Baked Brie Salad
items.description: Warm baked Brie with mixed greens, cashews, seasonal berries, and rosé vinaigrette.

items.name: Strip Steak Au Poivre & Wildfire Blue
items.description: 4oz pepper-crusted New York strip with Wildfire blue cheese, onion jam, and orange-infused oil.

items.name: Braised Short Ribs
items.description: Braised in house red wine with mushrooms and broccolini over polenta.
